info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-install-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for install manager operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2020-2023, 2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 13
